translations: adj.有关调查工作的；刑侦的

sentences.sentence: Detectives found no marks on the body.
sentences.translation: 侦探没有在尸体上发现任何痕迹。

sentences.sentence: Almost all fictional detectives are unreal.
sentences.translation: 几乎所有小说里的侦探都是虚构的。

sentences.sentence: Detectives have spent months gathering evidence.
sentences.translation: 侦探花了数月时间搜集证据。
